screen_desc: The screenshot shows a mobile shopping page on Costco's website, displaying two LG UltraGear gaming monitors. One monitor is priced at $299.99 and the other at $999.99. The page is sorted by Best Match, and there are options to filter and sort the results. The first monitor is already selected with the quantity set to 1 and is added to the cart.
action_think: The user wants to empty the cart and add LG Ultragear to the cart. The LG Ultragear has been added to the cart, so the next steps to follow are to select the checkout button.
action_plan: Select the checkout button from the cart page to proceed to checkout
action_result: By clicking on the shopping cart icon, you have now accessed the shopping cart page. This is necessary to complete the user request, as it allows you to review the items in your cart and proceed to checkout.
